name: 王明展
objective:
•　　Objectives:
This course will mainly introduce the past history, development and future trend of industrial engineering and management. It concludes industrial organization, personnel management, factory planning, cost analysis and control, R&D, production management, materials management, quality management and industrial safety.This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning. Material handling and site selection are also included.
schedule:
•　　Schedule:
1. Introduction to Industrial Engineering and Management 
2. Manufacturing Process & Automation System製造程序與自動化系統
3. Work Study and Human Engineering工作研究與人因工程
4. Facility Planning and Layout設施規畫與佈置
5. Quality Management品質管理
6. Production Management生產計畫與管制
7. Material & Supply Chain Management物料管理與供應鏈管理
8. Engineering Economic工程經濟
9. Operation Research作業研究
10 Enterprise Resource Planning 企業資源規畫
11 Others Topics其他相關課題
